languages.text: "Простите великодушно, Лорд-капитан! Ситуация... деликатная, вся надежда на вас! Я немедленно отправляюсь в кают-компанию и буду ждать вас там".
languages.translation_comment: NOTE: the speaker here is High Factotum Danrok, NOT Ravor!

languages.text: "I beg your most gracious forgiveness, Lord Captain! This is a... delicate situation, and we put all our hopes of resolving it in you! I will go to the wardroom post-haste and await your arrival."
languages.translation_comment: NOTE: the speaker here is High Factotum Danrok, NOT Ravor!
languages.original_text: "Простите великодушно, Лорд-капитан! Ситуация... деликатная, вся надежда на вас! Я немедленно отправляюсь в кают-компанию и буду ждать вас там".

traits.locale_text: "I beg your most gracious forgiveness, Lord Captain! This is a... delicate situation, and we put all of our hopes in you! I will head to the wardroom post-haste and wait for your arrival."
"I beg your most gracious forgiveness, Lord Captain! This is a... delicate situation, and we put all of our hopes in you! I will head to the wardroom post-haste and wait for your arrival."
"I beg your most gracious forgiveness, Lord Captain! This is a... delicate situation, and we put all our hopes of resolving it in you! I will go to the wardroom post-haste and await your arrival."
"I beg your most gracious forgiveness, Lord Captain! This is a... delicate situation, and we put all our hopes of resolving it in you! I will go to the wardroom post-haste and await your arrival."
"I beg your most gracious forgiveness, Lord Captain! This is a... delicate situation, and we put all our hopes of resolving it in you! I will go to the wardroom post-haste and await your arrival."
"I beg your most gracious forgiveness, Lord Captain! This is a... delicate situation, and we put all our hopes of resolving it in you! I will go to the wardroom post-haste and await your arrival."

languages.text: "Ich bitte Euch vielmals um Verzeihung, Lord Captain! Das ist eine ... delikate Situation, von der wir hoffen, dass Ihr sie auflösen könnt. Ich werde in der Offiziersmesse auf Euch warten."
languages.original_text: "I beg your most gracious forgiveness, Lord Captain! This is a... delicate situation, and we put all our hopes of resolving it in you! I will go to the wardroom post-haste and await your arrival."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte Euch vielmals um Verzeihung, Lord Captain! Das ist eine ... delikate Situation, von der wir hoffen, dass Ihr sie auflösen könnt. Ich werde in der Offiziersmesse auf Euch warten."

languages.text: « Je vous prie de me pardonner, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Il s'agit d'une situation si... délicate que nous ne pouvons comptons que sur vous pour la résoudre ! Je vais me rendre immédiatement au carré des officiers, où j'attendrai votre venue. »
languages.original_text: "I beg your most gracious forgiveness, Lord Captain! This is a... delicate situation, and we put all our hopes of resolving it in you! I will go to the wardroom post-haste and await your arrival."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous prie de me pardonner, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Il s'agit d'une situation si... délicate que nous ne pouvons comptons que sur vous pour la résoudre ! Je vais me rendre immédiatement au carré des officiers, où j'attendrai votre venue. »

languages.text: “我乞求您的宽恕，舰长大人！当下的情况……非常微妙，我们只能把希望寄托在您身上了！我会即刻前往军官室，等待您的到来。”
languages.original_text: "I beg your most gracious forgiveness, Lord Captain! This is a... delicate situation, and we put all our hopes of resolving it in you! I will go to the wardroom post-haste and await your arrival."

traits.locale_text: “我乞求您的宽恕，舰长大人！当下的情况……非常微妙，我们只能把希望寄托在您身上了！我会即刻前往军官室，等待您的到来。”

languages.text: «¡Le ruego que me perdone, Lord Capitán! La situación es... delicada, ¡y es usted nuestra única esperanza de resolverla! Iré inmediatamente a la sala de oficiales y esperaré su llegada».
languages.original_text: "I beg your most gracious forgiveness, Lord Captain! This is a... delicate situation, and we put all our hopes of resolving it in you! I will go to the wardroom post-haste and await your arrival."

traits.locale_text: «¡Le ruego que me perdone, Lord Capitán! La situación es... delicada, ¡y es usted nuestra única esperanza de resolverla! Iré inmediatamente a la sala de oficiales y esperaré su llegada».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、どうかお許しください！これは…微妙な状況です。解決への望みをすべてあなたに託しております！直ちに士官室へ向かい、到着をお待ちいたします」
languages.original_text: "I beg your most gracious forgiveness, Lord Captain! This is a... delicate situation, and we put all our hopes of resolving it in you! I will go to the wardroom post-haste and await your arrival."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、どうかお許しください！これは…微妙な状況です。解決への望みをすべてあなたに託しております！直ちに士官室へ向かい、到着をお待ちいたします」

languages.text: "Affınıza sığınıyorum Lord Kaptan! Bu... Hassas bir durum ve çözülmesi için tüm umutlarımızı size bağladık! Hemen subay salonuna gidecek ve gelişinizi bekleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I beg your most gracious forgiveness, Lord Captain! This is a... delicate situation, and we put all our hopes of resolving it in you! I will go to the wardroom post-haste and await your arrival."

traits.locale_text: "Affınıza sığınıyorum Lord Kaptan! Bu... Hassas bir durum ve çözülmesi için tüm umutlarımızı size bağladık! Hemen subay salonuna gidecek ve gelişinizi bekleyeceğim."
